item.title: 美国上诉法院法官就消费者保护机构关闭问题向特朗普政府施压
item.description: 华盛顿联邦上诉法院的法官们周二对特朗普政府的说法表示怀疑，该政府声称联邦法院无权阻止政府解雇美国消费者金融保护局绝大多数员工。【原文：Judges in Washington's federal appeals court on Tuesday appeared skeptical of Trump administration claims that federal courts do not have the power to block the government from firing the vast majority of workers at the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.】

item.title: 交易日：人工智能与关税减免的双重利好
item.description: 周二股市反弹，因市场认为近期对人工智能颠覆性影响的担忧过度，同时投资者消化了美国总统特朗普意外宣布的关税下调，并期待科技巨头英伟达的财报。【原文：Stocks rebounded on Tuesday, lifted by a sense that recent fears around AI disruption were overdone, as investors also digested a surprise tariff reduction from U.S. President Donald Trump and looked forward to tech giant Nvidia's earnings.】

item.title: Axon Enterprise第四季度盈利超预期，股价上涨
item.description: 电击枪制造商Axon Enterprise周二公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，这得益于其安防设备和软件产品强劲的市场需求。【原文：Taser-maker Axon Enterprise beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, driven by strong demand for its security devices and software products.】

item.title: MercadoLibre季度利润未达预期，但营收超出预期
item.description: MercadoLibre周二公布的季度利润下滑12.5%，低于分析师预期，这家电商公司因信贷和物流投资而受挫。不过得益于巴西和墨西哥业务的支撑，其营收超出市场预期。【原文：MercadoLibre on Tuesday posted a 12.5% decline in quarterly profit, missing analysts' projections, as the e-commerce firm was hit by credit and logistics investments. Revenue, however, came in above estimates, helped by business in Brazil and Mexico.】

item.title: 第一太阳能股价暴跌，因其给出悲观的净销售额预测
item.description: 美国最大太阳能电池板制造商第一太阳能公司预测，由于美国对进口太阳能电池板加征关税后其产品价格上涨，今年销售额将低于预期。该公司股价在盘后交易中暴跌近14%。【原文：First Solar , the biggest U.S.-based solar panel maker, forecasts current-year sales below estimates as the U.S. solar panel expects higher prices for its products following additional tariffs on foreign-made panels, sending its shares tumbling down nearly 14% after the bell.】

item.title: 汤森路透股价上涨，因其CoCounsel人工智能工具吸引百万用户
item.description: 汤森路透股价周二飙升逾11%，此前这家科技与内容公司宣布其面向企业的人工智能辅助工具CoCounsel用户数突破百万，缓解了市场对竞争对手人工智能工具可能引发行业颠覆的担忧。【原文：Thomson Reuters shares jumped more than 11% on Tuesday after the technology and content firm said its artificial intelligence-powered assistant for businesses, CoCounsel, has drawn one million users, easing fears of disruption by competing AI tools.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟表示，派拉蒙修订后的提案可能更具优势。
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司周二表示，经评估认定派拉蒙天空舞影业提交的修订方案可合理视为更优提案。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery said on Tuesday it had determined that the revised proposal from Paramount Skydance could reasonably be considered a superior proposal.】

item.title: GoDaddy年度营收预测低于预期，股价下跌
item.description: GoDaddy周二公布的年度营收预测低于华尔街预期，这表明其人工智能工具的采用速度放缓，且客户获取能力减弱。【原文：GoDaddy forecast annual revenue below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, a sign of slower adoption of its artificial‑intelligence tools and weaker customer acquisition.】

item.title: 澳大利亚福特斯克半年利润激增，创纪录出货量推动
item.description: 澳大利亚福特斯克公司周三公布上半年利润增长23%，主要得益于创纪录的铁矿石出货量和该商品更高的实现价格。【原文：Australia's Fortescue reported a 23% rise in first-half profit on Wednesday, powered by record iron ore shipments and higher realised prices for the commodity.】

item.title: 日经报道：中国顶尖芯片制造商计划提升先进芯片产量
item.description: 日经周三援引消息人士报道称，包括中芯国际和华虹半导体在内的中国顶级芯片制造商正计划提高先进半导体产量，以满足蓬勃发展的人工智能需求。【原文：China's top chipmakers, including SMIC , and Hua Hong Semiconductor , are aiming to boost their output of advanced semiconductors to meet burgeoning artificial intelligence demand, Nikkei said on Wednesday citing sources.】

item.title: 两位美联储官员认为人工智能不会引发重大动荡
item.description: 周二，两名美联储官员表示，他们不认为人工智能技术会引发经济领域的重大动荡。【原文：Two Federal Reserve officials on Tuesday said they do not expect artificial intelligence technology to drive a massive upheaval in the economy.】

item.title: 惠普警告称美国贸易法规和内存芯片成本将拖累年度预测
item.description: 惠普公司目前预计2026财年业绩将处于预测区间的低端，这家个人电脑制造商正面临美国贸易法规的挑战，同时因内存芯片危机导致成本上升，其股价在盘后交易中下跌3.6%。【原文：HP Inc now expects fiscal 2026 results to be at the low end of its forecasts, as the personal computer maker grapples with U.S. trade regulations and increasing costs due to the memory chip crisis, sending its shares down 3.6% in extended trading.】

item.title: 地中海餐厅连锁品牌Cava预计年度销售额将超出预期
item.description: 卡瓦集团周二预测全年同店销售额将超出华尔街预期，押注其健康地中海风味碗餐需求坚挺，尽管大宗商品价格上涨和关税相关成本正对其利润率构成压力。【原文：Cava Group forecast annual same-store sales above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, betting on resilient demand for its healthy Mediterranean bowls, even as higher commodity and tariff-related costs pressure its margins.】

item.title: Workday预测2027年年度订阅收入低于预期
item.description: Workday周二预测其2027财年订阅收入将低于华尔街预期，因经济不确定性导致企业削减技术支出，拖累新客户获取。【原文：Workday forecast its fiscal 2027 subscription revenue below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, as corporations cut technology spending amid economic uncertainty, weighing on new client wins.】

item.title: Lucid第四季度营收超预期，预测2026年产量将大幅增长
item.description: 电动汽车制造商Lucid周二公布的第四季度营收超出华尔街预期，并预测今年产量增幅可能超过50%。该公司正加速生产新近推出的Gravity运动型多功能车，同时准备推出一款全新中型车型。【原文：Electric vehicle maker Lucid beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter revenue on Tuesday and forecast a production rise that could top 50% this year as it ramps up its recently launched Gravity sport utility vehicles and prepares to roll out a new, mid-sized vehicle.】

item.title: 彭博新闻报道称，Stripe正考虑收购PayPal全部或部分业务。
item.description: 彭博新闻周二援引知情人士消息报道称，支付公司Stripe正考虑收购PayPal全部或部分业务。【原文：Payments firm Stripe is considering an acquisition of all or parts of PayPal , Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片初创企业SambaNova在由Vista领投的融资轮中筹集3.5亿美元，并与英特尔达成合作协议。
item.description: 桑巴诺瓦系统公司周二宣布，已完成新一轮3.5亿美元融资，并与英特尔达成合作协议，旨在把握人工智能应用领域对推理芯片激增的需求。【原文：SambaNova Systems said on Tuesday it has raised $350 million in a new funding round and struck a partnership with Intel as it seeks to capitalise on surging demand for inference chips used in artificial intelligence applications.】

item.title: 纽蒙特将向阿根廷Cerro Negro项目投资8亿美元
item.description: 阿根廷经济部长路易斯·卡普托周二表示，黄金生产商纽蒙特公司将向该国塞罗内格罗矿投资约8亿美元。【原文：Gold producer Newmont will invest approximately $800 million in Argentina's Cerro Negro mine, the country's Economy Minister, Luis Caputo, said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧莱雅、戴森、博视眼科成为最新申请特朗普关税退税的企业
item.description: 法庭文件显示，法国美妆集团欧莱雅、英国吸尘器制造商戴森以及隐形眼镜制造商博视眼科成为最新一批要求退还关税的企业。此前美国最高法院裁定特朗普总统实施的紧急贸易措施所征收的关税违法，这些企业紧随其后提起诉讼。【原文：French beauty group L'Oreal , British vacuum manufacturer Dyson and contact lens maker Bausch + Lomb became the latest corporations to sue for refunds of tariffs paid under President Donald Trump’s emergency trade measures, days after the U.S. Supreme Court ruled the duties unlawful, court filings showed.】

item.title: 高露洁棕榄公司计划捍卫董事会遴选中的DEI标准，信函显示
item.description: 据路透社获得的一封信函显示，高露洁棕榄公司告知国家法律与政策中心，其计划呼吁投资者投票反对保守派股东团体提出的提案。该提案旨在删除公司在董事会成员遴选过程中与多元化、公平与包容（DEI）相关的标准。【原文：Colgate-Palmolive told the National Legal and Policy Center that it intends to ask investors to vote against the conservative shareholder group's proposal to remove DEI-related criteria in the company's selection process for its board members, according to a letter viewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 消息人士称，人类中心论在与五角大楼的争执中坚持己见
item.description: 知情人士周二透露，人工智能实验室Anthropic无意放宽其军事用途的使用限制。此前该公司与五角大楼举行会议，商讨其未来发展方向。【原文：Artificial intelligence lab Anthropic has no intention of easing its usage restrictions for military purposes, a person familiar with the matter said on Tuesday, following a meeting to discuss its future with the Pentagon.】

item.title: 永利度假村称黑客窃取员工数据
item.description: 永利度假村周二表示，黑客已获取员工数据，公司正在调查此次数据泄露事件。【原文：Wynn Resorts on Tuesday said hackers had obtained employee data and that the company was investigating the breach.】

item.title: 美国官员称，中国尚未收到任何英伟达H200芯片。
item.description: None of Nvidia's second most advanced AI chips, known as the H200, have been sold to Chinese customers so far, a U.S. Commerce Department official said on Tuesday.

item.title: 美国法官暂时驳回xAI针对竞争对手OpenAI的商业秘密诉讼
item.description: 加州一名联邦法官周二驳回了埃隆·马斯克旗下人工智能初创公司xAI的诉讼请求，该诉讼指控竞争对手山姆·阿尔特曼的OpenAI窃取其商业机密。【原文：A federal judge in California on Tuesday dismissed a lawsuit from Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI that accused rival Sam Altman's OpenAI of stealing its trade secrets.】

item.title: 投资者为可能加剧焦虑的国情咨文演讲做好准备
item.description: 特朗普总统周二晚间的国情咨文演讲正值投资者处于关键时刻——他们近月来饱受市场动荡冲击，亟需稳定局面。【原文：The State of the Union speech from President Donald Trump on Tuesday evening comes at a pivotal point for investors, sideswiped by market turbulence in recent months and craving stability.】

item.title: 美国液化天然气霸主地位持续巩固，首船货运十周年之际
item.description: 自首船液化天然气（LNG）从得克萨斯州出口以来，十年的时间里，美国已迅速发展成为全球消费者最主要的超低温燃料供应国。【原文：In the ten years since the first export cargo of liquefied natural gas (LNG) left Texas, the United States has grown rapidly into the top supplier of the ultra-cooled fuel to world consumers.】

item.title: 人工智能会计初创公司Basis以11.5亿美元估值完成1亿美元融资
item.description: 人工智能会计初创公司Basis在B轮融资中筹集了1亿美元，公司估值达11.5亿美元。随着投资者纷纷向能够自主处理复杂任务的智能代理系统注入资金，该领域正迎来发展热潮。【原文：AI accounting startup Basis has raised $100 million in a Series B round valuing the company at $1.15 billion, as investors pour money into agentic AI systems designed to operate autonomously on complex tasks.】

item.title: 据Axios报道，赫格塞斯要求Anthropic在周五之前撤回其人工智能安全措施。
item.description: 据Axios周二报道，美国国防部长皮特·赫格塞斯已要求人工智能公司Anthropic在周五之前撤回其军用产品的安全保障措施。【原文：U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has given artificial intelligence company Anthropic until Friday to back down on safeguards for its products used by the military, Axios reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 瑞银任命戈利亚领导美国财富管理顾问团队
item.description: 据路透社周二获得的一份内部备忘录显示，瑞银集团（UBS）于3月1日任命丽莎·戈利亚（Lisa Golia）领导其美国财富管理顾问团队，此前她已担任该业务首席运营官两年。【原文：UBS promoted Lisa Golia to lead its U.S. wealth management advisers in the field on March 1 after serving as chief operating officer for the business over the last two years, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧洲人工智能芯片初创企业Axelera再获2.5亿美元融资
item.description: Axelera AI has secured $250 million in a funding round led by Innovation Industries that included BlackRock and SiteGround Capital as new investors, it said on Tuesday, marking one of the largest investments to date in a European AI chipmaking firm.
